page.title: 10CARCROFT INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Estate an attempt to provide opportunity for employment in this area. Jan. 1985 18.8% unemployed.This partly result of changes in traditional industries.Large pool of skilled and semi-skilled people available.Positioned here because of good communications-A638 direct route to North, linked by motorways (A1M,M18 to M1,M62)to regional and national markets.There is easy access to international markets by road ,rail and air.Industries already using the estate include frozen foods,steel fabrication,furniture manufacturing, plastics,engineering and a 27 acre Northern Distribution Terminal for Amoco (UK)Ltd.
